charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F  CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - Possession With Intent to Distribute at Least 50 Grams of Methamphetamine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance(1)

UNLAWFULLY, KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY DID POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, WHICH OFFENSE INVOLVED AT LEAST FIFTY (50) GRAMS OF A MIXTURE OR SUBSTANCE CONTAINING METHAMPHETAMINE, A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE IN VIOLATION OF 21 USC 841(a)(1).

charges.charge_offence_description: UNLAWFULLY, KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY DID POSSES
